title: Polish butcher charged with the rape and murder of Hull student Libby Squire
text:
A Polish butcher has been charged with the rape and murder of Hull student Libby Squire.

Pawel Relowicz, 25, is accused of killing the 21-year-old, who went missing after travelling home on her own from a night out in the city where she was studying as an undergraduate late on January 31.

Her body was recovered seven weeks later from the Humber Estuary.

Humberside Police spent months carrying out tests on her remains, in an effort to gather enough forensic evidence to bring her killer to justice.

Relowicz, who was arrested in connection with Ms Squire's death in August, was charged on Thursday.

He has been remanded in custody until a hearing at Hull Magistrates' Court on October 30.
description: A Polish butcher has been charged with the rape and murder of Hull student Libby Squire.
